title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.7 - Minimum weight to be carried
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.7 - Minimum weight to be carried

State Regulations

No horse shall be permitted to start in any
steeplechase or hurdle race under this Article carrying less than 130
pounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4054.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
